## FlowContent.peek() method

Gets a cursor

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | number | _(Optional)_ Optionally specifies the cursor's position. Default is zero. |
